code: import{FETCH_COURSE_PENDING,FETCH_COURSE_SUCCESS,FETCH_COURSE_FAIL}from'../constants/ActionTypes';import{getCourseInfo}from'../../services';var fetchCoursePending=function fetchCoursePending(mamh){return{type:FETCH_COURSE_PENDING,payload:mamh};};var fetchCourseSuccess=function fetchCourseSuccess(data){return{type:FETCH_COURSE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};var fetchCourseFail=function fetchCourseFail(mamh,error){return{type:FETCH_COURSE_FAIL,payload:{mamh:mamh,error:error}};};export var fetchCourse=function fetchCourse(mamh){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchCoursePending());getCourseInfo(mamh).then(function(data){return{mamh:mamh,data:data};}).then(function(data){dispatch(fetchCourseSuccess(data));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(fetchCourseFail(mamh,err.message));});};};
